Text: Hi Daman2Iife, you have very good torrents. :D I would like to know though, if this is 8bit or 10bit? Or is you default 10bit unless otherwise stated? Thank you. :)
db is right, the subs do not work
How is it that the subs do/don't work? What problems are being experienced?

I found (when playing with VLC) that the English option for subtitles doesn't work. But the Japanese option for subtitles shows the English subtitles just dandy. I DLed and shall continue to see for some time! TYVM Damn4life!
jazz i default 8bit. Some people still have no idea what 10bit is so i dont want to deal with green screen comments.
What player is the best to work out for english dubs only? i got DivX Plus but that player sucks -_-, tried with WMP but i can't get any of the Audio to work.
Hexetera, VLC is the best player for ANYTHING. never use WMP it just absolutely blows

I'm not sure if it's just me, but the audio on this seems a bit wonky.  I'm watching on VLC and haven't had an issue before but for some reason on this the voice quality actually sounds pretty poor.  I have to have it turned down so I practically can't hear the dialogue in order to not be bombarded with almost static-y sounding overtone whenever a character speaks loudly.  I don't have this issue with anything else so I know it's not my speakers.  Just my experience with it so far though.
